# Zambia Vision 2030 ETD Classifier  
*UNZA CSC 4792 (2024/25) - Group Project | Department of Computer Science*  

AI-powered system for classifying Emerging and Transformative Developments into Zambiaâ€™s Vision 2030 sectors using NLP and BERT. Automates tagging, identifies investment gaps, and powers dashboards for policymakers. Built with Python, PyTorch and Power BI, using ZDA and World Bank data.
